resources.string: The key to your Child\'s online safety

string.name: ram
string.u: Don\'t have an account ? Sign up

resources.string: Moderation rules in a child protection app are guidelines and filters that automatically monitor and restrict content to ensure a safe online environment for children. They help identify and block inappropriate or harmful material, fostering a secure online experience for young users.
Message alert in your child protection app notifies parents or guardians of any concerning messages or interactions their child has online.
Web alert alerts parents or guardians to potentially harmful websites or content accessed by their child, helping them take proactive measures to ensure online safety.
